alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 10:17AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with as much as 1 foot for the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. Snow level lowering to the 5000 foot level around 9 PM Sunday evening. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 11 AM Monday: Payson 1 to 3 inches Pine-Strawberry 3 to 5 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
